Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The upcoming Federal Budget has received much attention from a variety of people with a range of perspectives. Reports suggest that $11.3 billion has been allocated to fund a pay rise for aged care workers. There are concerns about the impact this will have on taxpayers. Additionally there are reports of a temporary surge in tax revenue due to high commodity prices which may help offset these costs. Other topics covered include changes to the migration program and a warning for consumers to be wary of advertising about the new 60-day script rule in pharmacies.
